title: Global market share held by PC vendors 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of shipments for 7 number of Brands.
The maximum Share of shipments 24.1 is found at Brand Lenovo and the minimum is found at Asus where Brand is 5.5.
There is a difference of 18.6 between the maximum Brand Lenovo and minimum Brand Asus.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Share of shipments in the y axis.
The maximum Share of shipments 24.1 is found at Brand Lenovo and the minimum is found at Asus where Brand is 5.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of shipments for 7 number of Brands.
The maximum Share of shipments 24.1 is found at Brand Lenovo and the minimum is found at Asus where Brand is 5.5.
There is a difference of 18.6 between the maximum Brand Lenovo and minimum Brand Asus.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Share of shipments in each Brand on the y axis.
The Share of shipments is highest at Brand Lenovo and lowest at Brand Asus.
The second highest Share of shipments is appeared to be the Brand HP Inc.
The difference of Share of shipments between the highest and lowest Brand is 18.6.
The Brand Lenovo has the highest Share of shipments, followed by HP Inc, and Others. Down to the Brand Asus which is the lowest.
The average Share of shipments in all 7 Brands is 14.29.
Summing up the values of all Brands, we get total 100.0.
